english: The Stargate's construction is split into phases, with each phase requiring more and more resources.\nYou have just completed Phase 1.
translation: 星際大門的建造分為幾個階段，每個階段都需要越來越多的資源。\n您剛剛完成了第一階段。

english: Select Phase 2 to see what you need to manufacture for this phase.
translation: 選擇第 2 階段，查看此階段需要製造的產品。

english: To complete Phase 2, we need to continue manufacturing Stargate Frames.\n\nInstead of 10, we now need 200!
translation: 要完成第二階段，我們需要繼續製造星門框架。\n\n，我們現在需要的不是 10 個，而是 200 個！

english: Sell your frames at a trading post to submit them to the Andromeda Project.
translation: 在交易站出售您的相框，將它們提交給仙女座計畫。

english: You can now close the Stargate screen.
translation: 現在您可以關閉 Stargate 畫面。
取消與 X 的交易

english: Captain, I can see you've sold a batch of Stargate parts, but I've received no corresponding payment.  We agreed to split all revenue 50/50.  This setup is costing me a fortune and I need to start making my return.  Please transfer the funds to my account as soon as possible.
translation: 船長，我看到你賣出了一批星門零件，但我沒有收到相應的款項。  我們說好所有收入五五分帳的  這個設置讓我損失慘重，我需要開始賺取回報。  請盡快匯款到我的帳戶。

english: Captain, I was sure I'd made our agreement clear.  Don't forget who owns this station, and all the equipment onboard.  50/50 was what we agreed.
translation: 船長，我想我已經說得很清楚了  別忘了誰擁有這個站，以及船上所有的設備。  五五分成是我們的協議

english: Captain, I was sure I'd made our agreement clear.  Don't forget who owns this station, and all the equipment onboard.  50/50 was what we agreed.
translation: 船長，我想我已經說得很清楚了  別忘了誰擁有這個站，以及船上所有的設備。  五五分成是我們的協議

english: I thought I could trust you.  Pay me the money you owe, immediately, or I will be forced to escalate.
translation: 我以為我可以信任你  馬上把你欠的錢還給我，否則我將被迫升級。

english: Captain, this is your final warning.  You are now willfully withholding sales revenue that is legally mine.  If you don't pay what you owe immediately I will have no choice but to terminate our agreement, seize control of my station, and recover any financial losses directly from you.
translation: 隊長，這是對你的最後警告。  你現在故意扣留合法屬於我的銷售收入。  如果你不立即支付欠款，我別無選擇，只能終止我們的協議，奪取我的站台控制權，並直接向你追討任何財務損失。

english: I'm disappointed, Captain. You're backing out after all the investment I've put into this project?
translation: 我很失望，隊長在我為這個項目投入了這麼多之後，你要打退堂鼓？

english: My name is Alexander James Elistar, and I'm the chairman and founder of A.J.E Industries.  I have a business proposition for you.  If you would be interested in setting up a production facility for me, I believe with some luck and a good deal of hard work we can both make substantial returns.
translation: 我的名字是 Alexander James Elistar，我是 A. J. E Industries 的主席和創始人。  我有一個生意提議給您。  如果您有興趣為我建立生產設施，我相信只要運氣好，再加上努力工作，我們都能獲得可觀的回報。

english: Please give me a call to discuss the details.

Captain.  Perhaps you are already aware, but there are big plans underway within this sector.  There are designs to build something... incredible, a transportation system with near infinite range, requiring state of the art manufacturing and industry.
translation: 船長。  也許你已經意識到了 但這個區域正在進行大規模的計劃  我們正在設計建造一些......難以置信的東西，一個近乎無限航程的運輸系統，需要最先進的製造和工業。

english: A stargate, big enough for our most massive fleets, shuttling humanity between galaxies as if they were nothing but neighbouring stars.  A new multi-galactic era for humanity.
translation: 一個足以容納最龐大艦隊的星門，將人類穿梭於星系之間，彷彿它們只是鄰近的恆星。  為人類開創一個全新的多星系時代。

english: In all my years I've never known so much capital to be allocated to one project.
translation: 這麼多年來，我從不知道有這麼多資金會分配到一個專案上。

english: There is a golden opportunity here for us, but the barriers to entry are high.  I have the assets, the capital, and the facilities that we need to fulfil the Andromeda Project's massive ambitions.
translation: 這對我們來說是個黃金機會 但進入的門檻很高  我有資產、資金和設施，我們需要這些來實現仙女座計畫的龐大野心。

english: Sadly, my days of running the shop floor in person are long behind me.  I need a floor manager, somebody who will oversee the day to day operations for me.  And my years of experience have taught me to spot talent when I see it.
translation: 很可惜，我親自管理店面的日子已經過去很久了。  我需要一個店面經理，一個能為我監督日常運作的人。  我多年的經驗讓我學會了如何在看到人才時發掘他們。

english: Here is my proposal.  I'll provide the factory station, and the seed capital so you are fully funded.  You'll set up the production facility for me, and oversee day to day operations, manufacturing parts for the Andromeda Project to their specifications.
translation: 這是我的建議。  我會提供工廠和種子資金，讓你有充足的資金  你要為我建立生產設施，並監督日常運作，按照仙女座計畫的規格生產零件。

english: And believe me when I say, there will be plenty to go around.
translation: 相信我的話，我們會有很多機會。

english: Call Alexander about the production facility
translation: 致電 Alexander 瞭解生產設施

english: Wonderful news. I'm very happy you've agreed to partner with me on this. My factory space station is in position nearby, ready for us to use as our base of operations.
translation: 好消息我很高興你同意與我合作。我的工廠太空站已在附近就位，隨時可以作為我們的行動基地。

english: This is the A.J.E Foundry.  A wonderful industrial facility, perfect for our needs.  I'll just need to provide you with some access codes so you can assume control of the facility.
translation: 這裡是 A.J.E 鑄造廠。  一個很棒的工業設施 非常適合我們的需求  我只需要給你提供一些進入密碼 這樣你就可以控制這個設施了

english: Look at that.  For years I manufactured engines and FTL drives right here, for every fleet that passed through the sector.  It's really fallen into disrepair.
translation: 看看這個  多年來我都在這裡製造引擎和超光速驅動器 為所有經過這個區域的艦隊服務  這裡已經殘破不堪了

english: Your first job is to send over a skeleton crew, and establish basic power generation and life support.  I had the previous crew box up some of the usable equipment.  You should find the parts you need are already in storage.
translation: 你的首要任務是派遣骨幹船員，並建立基本的發電和生命維持系統。  我讓之前的工作人員把一些可用的設備裝箱。  你應該會發現你需要的零件已經在倉庫裡了。

english: We need to tidy up the mess, but nothing needs to be wasted.  We can recycle all of the raw materials found on this station.
translation: 我們需要收拾爛攤子，但不需要浪費任何東西。  我們可以回收在這個站上發現的所有原材料。

english: There is an industrial smelter among the boxed equipment.  Install it and power it up, then set it to recycling all of the scrap metal.  This will give us an early supply of Metal Ingots.  A critical resource in manufacturing anything.
translation: 在裝箱的設備中有一個工業熔爐。  安裝並啟動它，然後將它設定為回收所有廢金屬。  這樣我們就能及早獲得金屬錠。  這是製造任何東西的關鍵資源。

english: Efficiency is going to be the key to this facility turning a profit.  Set up a storage zone for scrap metal near to your Smelter, and another for the Metal Ingots that come out.  Our crew will waste a lot less time carrying goods long distances.
translation: 效率是這個設施獲利的關鍵。  在您的冶煉廠附近設立一個廢金屬儲存區，並設立另一個儲存區來存放出來的金屬錠。  我們的工作人員將減少浪費長途跋涉運送貨物的時間。

english: If I could draw your attention to this schematic issued by the Andromeda Project.  You can see it's actually quite a simple part.  This is just a structural framework, onto which they'll build everything else.
translation: 我想請你們注意一下 安朵美達計劃所發佈的示意圖  你可以看到這部分其實很簡單  這只是一個結構框架 他們會在上面建造其他東西

english: We can manufacture these parts in just two stages out of Metal Ingots.  I've left a boxed Fabricator and an Assembly Table on the station.  Set them up next to each other, ideally near to the Metal Ingots.
translation: 我們只需兩個階段就能用金屬鑄錠製造出這些零件。  我在工作站上留了一個盒裝製造器和一個組裝台。  把它們架設在彼此旁邊，最好是靠近金屬錠。

english: Once they're installed, set the Fabricator to manufacture Frames, then set the Assembly Table to specialise them into finished Stargate Frames.  It's simple stuff, but eventually we will need a huge throughput.
translation: 安裝完成後，設定製造器製造框架，然後設定組裝台，將其專門製作成成品星門框架。  這是很簡單的東西，但最後我們會需要龐大的吞吐量。

english: Set Assembly Table to Stargate Frames
translation: 將組裝表設定為星門框架

english: They want us to provide an initial batch of 10 Stargate Frames, for certification.  They'll inspect our work and we'll be approved as official partners in the Andromeda Project.
translation: 他們要我們提供第一批十個星門框架 作為認證之用  他們會檢查我們的工作 我們會被批准成為仙女座計畫的正式合作夥伴

english: It shouldn't take too long.  If you run out of metal, remember you can recycle more of the ruined equipment around the facility.
translation: 時間應該不會太長。  如果您的金屬用完了，請記住您可以回收更多遭破壞的設備。

english: This is a message for A.J.E FOUNDRY.  We've received your samples and can report that they have passed comfortably within our engineering tolerances.  You are formally approved as licensed industry partners, and may now manufacture all items in our design manifest.
translation: 這是給 A.J.E FOUNDRY 的訊息。  我們已經收到您的樣品，可以報告的是，它們在我們的工程公差範圍內順利通過。  您已正式獲准成為授權的業界夥伴，現在可以製造我們設計清單中的所有產品。

english: Thank you for your endeavours, and good luck.
translation: 感謝您的努力，祝您好運。

english: Excellent.  Let's have a look at the Manifest that he mentioned, and see what is required next.
translation: 非常好。  讓我們看看他提到的 Manifest，看看接下來需要什麼。

english: It looks like it's just a bulk order of the part we already provided.  We need to make 200 more Stargate Frames.  We're already manufacturing them, but we'll need to scale up production or else this will take forever.
translation: 看起來只是大量訂購我們已經提供的零件。  我們需要再製造 200 個星門框架。  我們已經在生產了，但我們需要擴大生產規模，否則會花很長時間。

english: I'm releasing some of the seed money to you.  $600,000 should be enough for you to buy all the equipment we need to scale up.  Remember this isn't a gift.  I still own this station, and all the equipment onboard.
translation: 我把部分種子基金發放給你們。  600,000 美元應足以讓您購買我們擴大規模所需的所有設備。  記住這不是禮物  我仍然擁有這個站，以及船上所有的設備。

english: I suggest you buy more Smelters, more Fabricators, and more Assembly Tables.  A couple of each at least.  All that equipment will draw more juice, so you'll need to expand the power network with more Reactors and Batteries to cope.  And you'll need more crew to do the work.
translation: 我建議您購買更多的冶煉廠、更多的製造廠和更多的組裝台。  至少每種都買幾個。  所有這些設備都會消耗更多的電力，所以你需要擴大電力網路，增加更多的反應器和電池來應付。  您也需要更多的工作人員。

english: If you run out of Metal Ingots, you should be able to buy raw materials from the open Marketplace.  You can usually buy more Scrap Metal, but you'll also find Metallic Minerals for sale which can also be smelted into Metal Ingots.
translation: 如果您的金屬錠用完了，您應該可以從開放的市場購買原料。  您通常可以買到更多的廢金屬，但您也會發現有金屬礦物出售，這些礦物也可以冶煉成金屬錠。

english: I knew this would be a very profitable endeavour for us.  The Andromeda Project are so desperately in need of reliable manufacturing facilities that they're paying a fortune.
translation: 我就知道這件事會讓我們獲利豐厚  安朵美達計劃非常需要可靠的製造設備，所以他們付出了很大的代價。

english: Now, the sales revenue is going to flow through you.  But remember our agreement.  50/50.  I've put a lot of capital in to get us to this point, and I need to start seeing a return.
translation: 現在，銷售收入將通過您來流動。  但請記住我們的協議。  50/50.  我投入了很多資金才讓我們達到這一步，我需要開始看到回報。

english: Every time you sell a batch of parts to the Andromeda Project, you'll owe me half the revenue.  I'd appreciate it if you'd pay promptly.
translation: 每次你賣一批零件給安朵美達計劃 你就欠我一半的收入  如果你能及時付款，我會很感激的.

english: The later phases of this project will no doubt be much more involved.  But we are perfectly positioned to capitalise on this opportunity.  And there is a lot of opportunity to be had.
translation: 毫無疑問，這個項目的後期階段將牽涉更多。  但我們完全有能力把握這個機會。  我們有很多機會。

english: There are individuals behind this mega-project with wealth and resources far beyond my comprehension.  But their ambitions far exceed the capabilities of the other ships and people in this sector.  They are going to need our help.
translation: 這個大型計畫的幕後推手擁有我無法理解的財富和資源。  但他們的野心遠遠超過這個區域其他船隻和人們的能力。  他們需要我們的幫助。

english: We can take a short break, and I'll give you a call when I'm ready to start work on the next phase of the stargate project. You might want to stop some of your equipment in the meantime, we don't want to waste anything!
translation: 我們可以稍作休息，當我準備好開始星門計劃下一階段的工作時，我會給你打電話。在這段期間，你可能需要停止一些設備，我們不想浪費任何東西！

english: Resume work on the Stargate with X
translation: 與 X 恢復星際之門的工作

english: Captain, I think it's time we resumed work on the Stargate contract.  I've had a look ahead and the next phase is a huge step up.  Give me a call when you're ready to continue work.
translation: 船長，我想是時候恢復星門合同的工作了。  我已經有了一個展望，下一個階段是一個巨大的進步。  當你準備好繼續工作時給我打電話。

english: However, nothing they're asking us to produce is impossible, and I have a strong personal interest in seeing this project completed.  The sooner the better.
translation: 不過，他們要求我們製作的產品沒有一件是不可能的，而且我個人也很有興趣看到這個專案完成。  越快越好。

english: The Andromeda Project have released specifications for three different components.  We need to manufacture large quantities of all three to complete this phase, and each will require a different industrial setup.
translation: 仙女座計畫已經公佈了三種不同元件的規格。  我們需要大量製造這三種元件才能完成這個階段，而每種元件都需要不同的工業裝置。

english: Take control of the A.J.E Foundry

I propose we expand and upgrade the Station into a mining facility.  If we install Engines we can move to a rich asteroid vein, then Mining Lasers and Logistics Drones will give us the capability to harvest the raw materials we need.
translation: 我建議我們擴充並升級太空站成為採礦設施。  如果我們安裝引擎，就可以移動到豐富的小行星礦脈，然後採礦雷射器和物流無人機將讓我們有能力採收所需的原料。

english: The Stargate Actuators are made on the Assembly Table as normal, and they require a Stargate Frame and a Motor. Motors can be made in fabricators.
translation: 星門致動器是在組裝台上正常製作，它們需要一個星門框架和一個馬達。馬達可以在製造機中製作。

english: You'll need to mine Metallic Minerals and Copper Minerals, then melt those materials into ingots in an array of Smelters.  You can then fabricate the Motors and Frames, and finally assemble them into Stargate Actuators.
translation: 您需要開採金屬礦物和銅礦物，然後在一系列冶煉廠中將這些材料熔化成銅錠。  然後您可以製造馬達和框架，最後將它們組裝成星門致動器。

english: I'll release some more of the seed capital to cover the costs of the upgrade, but you can take care of the details.
translation: 我會再釋放一些種子資金來支付升級的費用，但你可以負責細節。

english: The second part is a chemical compound they're calling Stargate Resin.  It's synthesised in a Chemical Lab, but we first need huge volumes of Metreon Gas.  It's found only in deep space nebulas.
translation: 第二部分是一種化學化合物，他們稱之為星門樹脂。  它可以在化學實驗室合成，但我們首先需要大量的 Metreon 氣體。  這種氣體只有在深空恆星中才能找到。

english: My thinking is to buy a suitable fuselage from a Shipyard, and then convert it into a dedicated gas capture and refining facility.  There's a good ship nearby.  You can buy it on my behalf and then set it up, and we'll drop it off in a rich gas cloud and leave it running.
translation: 我的想法是向船廠購買一個合適的機身，然後將其改裝成專用的瓦斯捕捉與提煉設施。  附近有艘好船。  你可以以我的名義買下它，然後把它設置好，我們把它扔到富含瓦斯的雲層中，讓它運行。

english: The final requirement is a few barrels of Stable Isotopes.  These are easily captured during routine FTL travel.  I think you can take care of this one yourself, but if necessary I can talk you through it.
translation: 最後需要的是幾桶穩定同位素。  這些在例行超光速旅行中很容易捕獲。  我想你可以自己解決這個問題，但如果有必要的話，我可以教你。

english: There is a ship for sale here that's perfect for our gas collection enterprise.  Let's buy it and add it to the fleet.
translation: 這裡有一艘船要賣，非常適合我們的瓦斯收集事業。  讓我們買下它，加入我們的艦隊。

english: Gas collection is a slow process.  Our aim should be to place this vessel within a dense metreon nebula, slowly absorbing the gas and refining it over time.  Once we're in the nebula we won't be able to easily upgrade the ship, so we'll want to set it up as much as possible in advance.
translation: 氣體收集是一個緩慢的過程。  我們的目標應該是將這艘船放置在一個密集的米子星雲裡，慢慢地吸收氣體，並隨時間精煉。  一旦我們進入星雲，就無法輕易升級這艘船，所以我們要盡可能提前設定好。

english: I'll send over more seed money and you can outfit the ship as you see best.
translation: 我會寄更多的種子基金過來，你可以按照你認為最好的方式裝備這艘船。

english: The process of making Stargate Resin starts with a Gas Collector bringing in the Metreon Gas.  We then pipe that into a Refinery to produce Refined Metreon, then into a Chemical Lab where the Stargate Resin can be synthesised.
translation: 製造星門樹脂的過程首先由氣體收集器將 Metreon 氣體帶入。  然後，我們將氣體送入精煉廠，製造出精煉 Metreon，再送入化學實驗室，合成星門樹脂。

english: You may need to shop around a bit, if the local trade post doesn't have everything you need.
translation: 如果當地的貿易站沒有您需要的所有東西，您可能需要多逛逛。

english: Once the ship is ready, pair it up with one of your FTL capable vessels, and jump into a nearby nebula to begin the process of gas collection.
translation: 一旦飛船準備就緒，將它與您的一艘具備超光速能力的船隻配對，然後跳到附近的星雲，開始收集氣體的過程。

english: Transport the Gas Collector to a Nebula
translation: 將氣體收集器運送到星雲
開始收集 Metreon 瓦斯 [*X/100]

english: We need to produce 100 Stable Isotopes. This is a chemical compound we must synthesise and deliver in barrels to the Andromeda Project.
translation: 我們需要生產100個穩定同位素。這是我們必須合成的化學化合物，並用桶裝運送至仙女座計畫。

english: Begin unloading barrels of Stable Isotopes [*X/10]
translation: 開始卸下一桶桶的穩定同位素 [*X/10]

english: I'm sure you've noticed, we're making a small fortune from all of this.  Truth be told, I'm not really doing this for the revenue.  I already have more than I can ever spend.  But I'm running out of time.  The Doctors have made that clear to me.
translation: 我相信您已經注意到了，我們從這一切中賺了一小筆錢。  說實話，我這樣做並不是為了賺錢。  我的錢已經多得花不完了。  但我快沒時間了  醫生們已經跟我說得很清楚了

english: I've been around quite a few years.  I've had my share of success, built my empire, my fortune.  I live a comfortable life.  But I find myself thinking more and more about what I want to do with the time I have left.
translation: 我已經活了好幾年了。  我有我的成功，建立了我的帝國，我的財富。  我過著舒適的生活。  但我發現自己越來越想知道，我想在剩下的時間裡做些什麼。

english: I just want to be the first at something huge.  The first person to visit another galaxy.  Alexander James Elistar.  That's a name that people would remember.
translation: 我只想成為第一個做大事的人。  第一個造訪另一個星系的人。  Alexander James Elistar  這個名字人們會記得的。

english: Let's take another break and I'll contact you when the Andromeda Project releases the manifest for their next phase.
translation: 我們再休息一下，等仙女座計畫發佈下一階段的宣言時，我會再跟你聯絡。

english: There's a situation brewing at our factory in the asteroid belt.  You'd better take a look.
translation: 我們在小行星帶的工廠出了點狀況  你最好去看看

english: Is he in there?  Alexander?  Where is he?
translation: 他在裡面嗎？  亞歷山大？  他在哪兒？

english: I'm not going to ask again.  I demand to speak to Alexander Elistar.  Immediately!  I am armed!
translation: 我不會再問了  我要求和Alexander Elistar談談  馬上  我有武器

english: Raymond.  It's been quite a while.  How have you been?
translation: 雷蒙  好久不見  最近好嗎？

english: How have I been?  You know exactly how I've been.  I'm here to collect my share.
translation: 我過得怎麼樣？  你很清楚我過得怎麼樣  我是來拿我那份的

english: Captain, I'll take care of this.  My private security are on their way.  I'll keep him talking, but there's no need for bloodshed.
translation: 隊長，我會處理的  我的私人保鏢已經在路上了  我會讓他繼續說下去 但沒必要流血

english: The designs were mine.  The patents were mine!  All of this, it's all built on my work.
translation: 設計是我的。  專利是我的！  所有這些，都是建立在我的作品上。

english: You were compensated for your work Raymond.  You signed the contract.
translation: 你的工作得到了補償 Raymond.  你簽了合同

english: For pennies!  You screwed me, and now it's worth millions!
translation: 為了幾分錢  你耍了我，現在它值幾百萬了

english: I want my share.  Deal me in.  10% ownership of this new venture of yours.  I'm being reasonable, but the law is on my side.  Don't make me shut you down Alexander.
translation: 我要我那一份  讓我加入  10%的股份  我講道理，但法律站在我這邊  別逼我讓你關門 Alexander

english: This is Private Security vessel DOGMA, under exclusive contract to A.J.E Industries.
translation: 這是私人保全船 DOGMA，與 A.J.E Industries 簽有專屬合約。

english: You are operating in a dangerous and threatening manner in the vicinity of an A.J.E corporate facility.
translation: 您在 A.J.E 公司設施附近以危險且具威脅性的方式進行操作。

english: You are ordered to stand down and withdraw immediately.
We are authorised by deep space convention in the use of deadly force in defense of our client's assets.
translation: 深空公約授權我們使用致命武力保護客戶的資產。

english: THERE WILL BE NO FURTHER WARNING.
translation: 將不會有進一步的警告。

english: I'll be coming for you Alexander, and this time I'm not asking for 10%. I want it all.
translation: 我會來找你的 亞歷山大，這次我不會再要一成了我要全部

english: Queue the installation of equipment inside your ship.
translation: 在您的船艦內排隊安裝設備。

english: You will be missing *X when ongoing deliveries/logistics complete
translation: 當正在進行的交貨/物流完成時，您將會錯過*X

english: Mining Lasers extract three times as many minerals per shot
translation: 採礦雷射每次擷取的礦物量是傳統的三倍

english: We have marked the location of the fortress on your map. Good luck, Captain.
translation: 我們已經在你的地圖上標出了要塞的位置。祝你好運，船長

english: Hostiles have set up a fortress within the sector. It appears to be where they are fabricating their ships.
translation: 敵人在這個區域建立了一個堡壘。這似乎是他們製造船隻的地方。

english: The fortress is giving them significant power across the sector and must be dealt with.
translation: 要塞賦予他們在整個區域的重大權力，必須加以處理。

english: Travel to the fortress, destroy it, and eliminate any remaining hostiles
translation: 前往堡壘，摧毀它，並消除所有剩餘的敵人

english: Greetings Captain. What you've found could prove to be very useful to the Stargate project.
translation: 你好，船長你所發現的東西對星門計劃可能非常有用。

english: Since you've used our Stargate to reach the new sector, we believe it's only fair that you assist us with researching the uses of the new resources.
translation: 既然你們使用我們的星際之門到達了新的區域，我們相信你們協助我們研究新資源的用途是很公平的。

english: Your co-operation has been paramount in the project's sucess so far, and it must continue until the project is complete.
translation: 到目前為止，您的合作對於本專案的成功至關重要，在本專案完成之前，您的合作必須持續下去。

english: Thank you, Captain. We will be in touch when you have completed your research.
translation: 謝謝您，船長。當您完成研究後，我們會再與您聯絡。

english: The results of your research are very promising, and we'd like you to send us some refined samples of the new resources.
translation: 您的研究結果很有希望，我們希望您能寄一些新資源的精制樣品給我們。

english: We expect a shipment of Neubidium ingots and the stabilised Zeleon gas.
translation: 我們預期會有一批 Neubidium 錠和穩定的 Zeleon 氣體。

english: Thank you for your co-operation, Captain.
Complete Phase 6 of the Stargate Project
Enable features to help translators, such as Alt to reveal English and Ctrl to reveal the phrase key.
translation: 啟用有助於翻譯的功能，例如 Alt 顯示英文，Ctrl 顯示詞組鍵。

english: Lets you select a paint from the exterior of your ship (can also be used by pressing the "Shift" key)
translation: 讓您從船艦外部選取塗裝（也可以按下「Shift」鍵使用）

english: When enabled, the current game will be saved when abandoned or when the game is quit in a file called exitsave.\n\nCAUTION: This file will be overwritten on every exit.
translation: 當啟用時，當前遊戲會在放棄或退出遊戲時儲存在一個名為 exitsave 的檔案中。\n\n注意：這個檔案會在每次退出時被覆寫。

english: Captain, this sector has never been visited before and it is outside of my security jurisdiction.
translation: 上尉，這個區域從未被到訪過，而且不在我的安全管轄範圍內。

english: We have a full scan underway for the sector, once it's completed more locations will be marked on your map. In the systems surveyed so far we've found new resources, which may be just a glimpse into what this sector has to offer.
translation: 我們正在對這個區域進行全面掃描，一旦完成，您的地圖上將會標出更多地點。在目前調查過的系統中，我們發現了新的資源，這可能只是這個區域所能提供的一瞥。

english: Unfortunately, that means pirates will probably find their way here soon, but it seems clear for now.
translation: 不幸的是，這意味著海盜可能很快就會找到這裡來，但目前看來是安全的。

english: It's not too complex.  It starts with a Hyperspace Scoop, or several ideally, that you can fit to your vessels.  Every time you make an FTL jump you'll collect more as you pass through deep space at light speed.  You can then pipe those isotopes into a Refinery and convert them into Stable Isotopes.
translation: 它並不太複雜。  一開始，您可以在您的船隻上安裝一個或幾個 Hyperspace Scoop。  每次進行超光速跳躍時，當您以光速通過深空時，就會收集到更多的同位素。  然後，您可以將這些同位素導入精煉廠，將它們轉換成穩定同位素。

english: BATTLE STATIONS must be activated before your weapons can be used.\n\nThis will tell your crew to prepare for battle!
translation: BATTLE STATIONS（戰鬥站）必須先啟動，才能使用您的武器。\n\n這會告訴您的船員準備戰鬥！

english: The Stargate enables travel between different sectors.\n\nThe jump costs a single FTL charge and the Stargate will use more power while a jump is in progress.
translation: 星際之門可以在不同的區域之間進行旅行。\n\n躍進需要耗費一次超光速充電，星際之門在進行躍進時會消耗更多的能量。

english: First, let's open the FTL window.
translation: 首先，讓我們打開 FTL 視窗。

english: The REACTOR is activated! We are now generating power for our ship.
translation: REACTOR 已啟動！我們正在為我們的船隻發電。

english:
Let's turn our attention to the STARGATE PROJECT.

We can view our progress from the Stargate screen.

Open the STARGATE screen.
translation:
我們可以從星門畫面檢視進度。

開啟星門畫面。

english: Click on the nearby RUINED EQUIPMENT to instruct your crew to dismantle it into SCRAP METAL.
translation: 按一下附近的殘破裝備，指示您的工作人員將其拆成廢金屬。

english: The ship is fitted with engines and an FTL drive for Interstellar Travel! But it does need a crew.\n\nOpen the TRADE screen.
translation: 這艘船裝有引擎和超光速驅動器，可以進行星際旅行！\n\n開啟 TRADE 畫面。

english: We can stop dismantling by clicking the dismantle button again or by closing the construction menu.\n\nClose the menu by clicking the CONSTRUCTION button or by pressing ESC.
translation: 我們可以再次按下拆卸按鈕或關閉施工功能表來停止拆卸。\n\n，按下施工按鈕或按下 ESC 關閉功能表。

english:
Use {PanUp1}{PanLeft1}{PanDown1}{PanRight1} or the ARROW KEYS to move the view around.

Zoom the view using the MOUSE WHEEL, or {ZoomIn}/{ZoomOut} on the keyboard.

Drag the view by holding the MIDDLE MOUSE BUTTON.
translation:
使用{PanUp1}{PanLeft1} {PanDown1} {PanRight1} 或箭頭鍵移動檢視。

使用滑鼠滑輪或鍵盤上的{ZoomIn}/{ZoomOut} 縮放檢視。

按住中間滑鼠按鈕拖曳檢視。

english: We should give our engines a small test flight.  To maneuver our ship, switch into TACTICAL mode by clicking the highlighted button, or pressing {ToggleTactical}.
translation: 我們應該讓引擎進行一次小型試飛。  要操控我們的飛船，請按一下反白的按鈕，或按{ToggleTactical} 切換到 TACTICAL 模式。

english: Exit TACTICAL mode by clicking the button again, or pressing {ToggleTactical}.
translation: 再次按一下按鈕，或按{ToggleTactical} ，退出 TACTICAL 模式。

english: To get started, switch to TACTICAL mode by clicking the button or pressing {ToggleTactical}.
translation: 要開始使用，請按一下按鈕或按{ToggleTactical} 切換到 TACTICAL 模式。

english: Use the Maneuvering controls to move the ship into position.\n\nYou can also use the keys {ManoeuvreUp}, {ManoeuvreLeft}, {ManoeuvreDown}, {ManoeuvreRight} to move, and {ManoeuvreClockwise} and {ManoeuvreCounterClockwise} to rotate the ship.
translation: \n\n您也可以使用按鍵{ManoeuvreUp},{ManoeuvreLeft},{ManoeuvreDown},{ManoeuvreRight} 來移動，{ManoeuvreClockwise} 和{ManoeuvreCounterClockwise} 來旋轉飛船。

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to buy in multiples of 5.
translation: 注意：您可以 SHIFT CLICK 以 5 的倍數購買。

english:
This vessel is fresh out of the shipyard production line.

It's just an empty hull right now, without power or a breathable atmosphere. Our first job is to fix that.

Click NEXT to continue.
translation:
這艘船剛從造船廠的生產線出來，現在只是一個空殼，沒有動力，也沒有可呼吸的大氣。我們的首要任務就是解決這個問題。

點選 NEXT 繼續。

english: Let's begin by installing a REACTOR, to generate power for our ship.\n\nClick into the CONSTRUCTION menu, then click INSTALL.
translation: \n\n按一下「建設」功能表，然後按一下「安裝」。

english: This is all the boxed equipment you have available on-board.\n\nSelect REACTOR from the list.
Stamp the REACTOR down inside your ship.
translation: 將 REACTOR 壓在您的船艦內。

english: Your crew will install the REACTOR.
translation: 您的工作人員將安裝 REACTOR。

english: The REACTOR needs FUEL, and we use a FUEL LOADER to pump it to the REACTOR.\n\nSelect the FUEL LOADER from the Construction menu.
translation: REACTOR 需要燃料，我們使用 FUEL LOADER 將燃料泵送到 REACTOR。\n\n從「建築」選單中選擇 FUEL LOADER。

english: Stamp the FUEL LOADER down somewhere near the REACTOR.
translation: 將 FUEL LOADER 壓在 REACTOR 附近。

english: We need to connect the FUEL LOADER to the REACTOR, using a Pipe.\n\nSelect PIPES from the Construction Menu.
translation: 我們需要使用管道將 FUEL LOADER 連接到 REACTOR。\n\n從「建築」選單中選擇「管道」。

english:
Drag a pipe from the FUEL LOADER to the REACTOR, connecting the yellow pipe circles.

FUEL PIPES are used to connect the output from one piece of equipment into the input of another.

FUEL PIPES are yellow and must connect the yellow circles on equipment.
translation:
從 FUEL LOADER 拖曳一條管道到 REACTOR，連接黃色的管道圓圈。

FUEL PIPES 用於將一台設備的輸出連接到另一台設備的輸入。

FUEL PIPES 是黃色的，必須連接設備上的黃色圓圈。

english: We now need to provide a breathable atmosphere for our crew. This is done with an AIRDUCT.\n\nInstall an AIRDUCT somewhere near the Reactor.
translation: 我們現在需要為船員提供一個可呼吸的環境。\n\n在反應堆附近的某個地方安裝透氣管。

english: The AIRDUCT needs to be powered from the REACTOR.  Select CABLES from the CONSTRUCTION menu.
translation: AIRDUCT 需由 REACTOR 供電。  從 CONSTRUCTION（構造）功能表中選擇 CABLES。

english:
Drag a power cable from the REACTOR to the AIRDUCT, connecting the red circles.

POWER CABLES are used to connect reactors to any equipment that needs power.

POWER CABLES are red and must connect red circles on equipment.
translation:
從 REACTOR 拖曳電源線到 AIRDUCT，連接紅色圓圈。

電源線用於連接反應器和任何需要電源的設備。

電源線為紅色，必須連接設備上的紅色圓圈。

english: The AIRDUCT needs OXYGEN, in the same way as the REACTOR needs FUEL. We can use an OXYGEN LOADER to provide OXYGEN.\n\nInstall an OXYGEN LOADER near the AIRDUCT.
translation: 導氣管需要氧氣，就像反應器需要燃料一樣。我們可以使用氧氣載入器來提供氧氣。\n\n在導氣管附近安裝氧氣載入器。

english: We need to connect the OXYGEN LOADER into the AIRDUCT using PIPES.\n\nSelect PIPES from the CONSTRUCTION menu.
translation: 我們需要使用 PIPES 將 OXYGEN LOADER 連接到 AIRDUCT。\n\n從 CONSTRUCTION（構造）功能表中選擇 PIPES。

english: Drag a PIPE from the OXYGEN LOADER to the AIRDUCT, connecting the BLUE circles.
translation: 從 OXYGEN LOADER 拖曳 PIPE 到 AIRDUCT，連接藍色的圓圈。

english: The AIRDUCT is activated and is pressurising the cabin! The atmosphere will soon be breathable.
translation: AIRDUCT 已啟動，正在為機艙加壓！大氣很快就可以呼吸了。

english: Engines require both POWER and FUEL to operate. We must connect both engines to fuel and power.
translation: 引擎的運作需要動力和燃料。我們必須將引擎與燃料和動力連接起來。

english: Now use the CABLES menu to power up the engine, by connecting it to your existing red power lines.
translation: 現在使用 CABLES 功能表，將引擎連接至現有的紅色電源線，為引擎供電。

english: We cannot deliver those passengers to their destination without Faster-Than-Light travel. Unfortunately this ship is not equipped with its own FTL drive.\n\nWe'll need to buy one and set it up.
translation: 如果沒有超光速旅行，我們無法將這些乘客送到目的地。不幸的是，這艘船沒有裝備自己的超光速驅動器。\n\n我們需要買一個並安裝好。

english: Open the trade screen to purchase an FTL drive.
translation: 開啟交易畫面購買 FTL 驅動器。

english: The items we need are listed under PROPULSION. Select that category.
translation: 我們需要的物品列在 PROPULSION 下。請選擇該類別。

english: Add one FTL drive to our order by clicking on the entry in the list.
translation: 點選清單中的項目，將一個 FTL 驅動器加入我們的訂單。

english: FTL drives consume one fuel charge per jump. Add 5 FTL Charges to the order as well.
translation: 超光速驅動器每次跳躍消耗一個燃料充電。在訂單中也加入 5 個 FTL 充電。

english: Install the FTL drive anywhere in your ship.
translation: 將 FTL 驅動器安裝在您船艦的任何位置。

english: Connect the FTL drive to your power network.
translation: 將 FTL 硬碟機連接到您的電源網路。

english: We can make things more efficient for our crew by telling them to store FTL Charges near the FTL drive.\n\nSelect STORAGE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar, then select FTL Charges from the list.
translation: \n\n從「建築」工具列中選擇「儲存」，然後從清單中選擇「FTL 充電」。

english: Now drag out a storage zone near to the FTL drive.
translation: 現在在超光速驅動器附近拖出一個儲存區。

english: The crew will move all the FTL Charges into this zone.
translation: 船員將把所有的 FTL 充電器移到這個區域。

english: This screen shows the phases that require construction in order to complete the STARGATE.\n\nWe are in PHASE 1. Work has only just begun.
translation: 此畫面顯示完成 STARGATE 所需的建造階段。\n\n我們現在處於階段 1。工作才剛開始。

english:
On the left of the screen you can see the requirements to complete PHASE 1.

We need to manufacture:
- 100 STARGATE FRAMES
- 10 STARGATE RESIN
translation:
我們需要製造：
- 100 STARGATE FRAMES
- 10 STARGATE RESIN

english: These PHASE 1 components are easy to manufacture, and we already have what we need onboard.\n\nBut we can sell them to the STARGATE PROJECT for a small fortune.
translation: 這些 PHASE 1 元件很容易製造，而且我們船上已經有我們需要的東西。\n\n，但我們可以賣給 STARGATE PROJECT，花一小筆錢。

english: Close the STARGATE screen by clicking on the toolbar again (or press ESC).
translation: 再次按一下工具列（或按 ESC）關閉 STARGATE 畫面。

english: We are now going to learn how to produce STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: 我們現在要學習如何製作星門框。

english: Components are manufactured in a FABRICATOR, using raw materials like METAL INGOTS.\n\nInstall a FABRICATOR somewhere in the South East quadrant of the station.
translation: 組件在 FABRICATOR 中製造，使用的原料是金屬 INGOTS。\n\n在車站東南象限的某個地方安裝一個 FABRICATOR。

english: Those components are then assembled into finished products on an ASSEMBLY TABLE.\n\nInstall an ASSEMBLY TABLE somewhere near the FABRICATOR.
translation: 這些組件會在組裝台上組裝成成品。\n\n在製造機附近安裝組裝台。

english: This new equipment needs power.  Build POWER CABLES to connect your REACTOR to the FABRICATOR and ASSEMBLY TABLE.
translation: 這個新設備需要電源。  製造電源纜線，將您的 REACTOR 連接到製造器和組裝台。

english: We need to configure the new equipment to make the products that we want.\n\nRIGHT CLICK on the FABRICATOR to configure it.
translation: 我們需要設定新設備，以製造我們想要的產品。\n\n右擊 FABRICATOR 進行設定。

english: This drop-down menu shows all of the components that we can manufacture in a FABRICATOR.\n\nSelect FRAME from the list.
translation: 此下拉式功能表顯示我們可以在 FABRICATOR 製造的所有組件。\n\n從清單中選擇 FRAME。

english: We need to configure the ASSEMBLY TABLE in the same way.\n\nRIGHT CLICK on the assembly table.
translation: 我們需要以相同的方式設定 ASSEMBLY TABLE。\n\n右擊組裝表。

english: Select STARGATE FRAME from the drop-down menu.
translation: 從下拉式功能表中選擇 STARGATE FRAME。

english: Close the Equipment Panel by clicking the X in the top right corner, or pressing ESC.
translation: 按一下右上角的 X 或按 ESC 關閉「設備面板」。

english: Close the Equipment Panel by clicking the X in the top right corner, or pressing ESC.
translation: 按一下右上角的 X 或按 ESC 關閉「設備面板」。

english: Your crew are now fabricating FRAMES out of METAL INGOTS, then assembling those FRAMES into STARGATE FRAMES, which we can sell to the STARGATE project for profit.
translation: 您的工作人員現在正在製造金屬箭頭框架，然後將這些框架組裝成 STARGATE 框架，我們可以將這些框架賣給 STARGATE 計劃獲利。

english: We are going to need a lot of METAL INGOTS if we're to make enough of those STARGATE FRAMES.\n\nWe don't have many METAL INGOTS on board, and will run out soon.
translation: 如果要製造足夠的星門框架，我們需要大量的金屬蝸牛。\n\n我們船上的金屬蝸牛不多，很快就會用完。

english: But we do have plenty of SCRAP METAL, and we can melt that down in a SMELTER.\n\nBuild a SMELTER somewhere near the production line.
translation: \n\n在生產線附近的某處建造一台 SMELTER。

english: Connect the smelters to the REACTOR using POWER CABLES
translation: 使用電源線將冶煉器連接到 REACTOR

english: Right click on the SMELTER and set its material to be SCRAP METAL.
translation: 在 SMELTER 上按一下滑鼠右鍵，將其材質設定為 SCRAP METAL。

english: The crew will now load in all the SCRAP METAL and smelt it into much more useful METAL INGOTS.
translation: 工作人員現在會裝入所有的廢金屬，並將其冶煉成更有用的金屬锭。

english: There is a ton of RUINED EQUIPMENT around this old station, that we can break down into SCRAP METAL.\n\nSelect DISMANTLE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar.
We can make things more efficient for our crew by telling them to store SCRAP METAL near to the SMELTER.\n\nSelect STORAGE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar, then select SCRAP METAL from the list.
translation: \n\n從「建築」工具列中選擇「儲存」，然後從清單中選擇「廢棄金屬」，可以讓工作人員更有效率。

english: Now drag out a storage zone near to the SMELTER.
translation: 現在在 SMELTER 附近拖出一個儲存區。

english: The crew will move all the SCRAP METAL into this zone.
translation: 工作人員會將所有的廢金屬移到這個區域。

english: Your crew will now use the equipment to produce some STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: 您的船員現在要使用設備製造一些星門框架。

english: We can use the TRADE system to buy raw materials to produce more STARGATE FRAMES, as well as resources we will need to survive.\n\nReopen the TRADE screen.
METALLIC MINERALS can be smelted into METAL INGOTS just like SCRAP METAL.\n\nAdd all the METALLIC MINERALS to the trade.
translation: METALLIC MINERALS（金屬礦物）可以像 SCRAP METAL（碎金屬）一樣冶煉成 METAL INGOTS（金屬塊）。\n\n將所有 METALLIC MINERALS（金屬礦物）加入交易中。

english: We will also need another SMELTER to begin processing those METALLIC MINERALS.\n\nFind the SMELTER under the INDUSTRY tab and add one to the order.
translation: 我們也需要另一個 SMELTER 來開始處理這些金屬礦物。\n\n在 INDUSTRY（工業）標籤下找到 SMELTER，並將其加入訂單中。

english:
This is a good opportunity to stock up on some other resources that are critical for life support.

We'd recommend you purchase:

 - 2x FUEL
 - 2x OXYGEN
 - 2x WATER
 - 2x FOOD

- HIRE 5 MORE CREW

CONFIRM the order when you are done.
translation:
我們建議您購買：

 - 2x FUEL
 - 2x OXYGEN
 - 2x WATER
 - 2x FOOD

- HIRE 5 MORE CREW

完成後確認訂單。

english: Once those goods have arrived, you should install your second SMELTER somewhere near the first.
translation: 一旦這些貨物到達，您應該在靠近第一台 SMELTER 的某個地方安裝第二台 SMELTER。

english: Set the SMELTER to process those METALLIC MINERALS you bought into more METAL INGOTS.
translation: 設定 SMELTER，將您購買的金屬礦物加工成更多的金屬菁英。

english: Well done, you are now all set to produce STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: 做得好！您現在已準備好製作星門框。

english: We will need a crew. Hire five CREW MEMBERS from the TRADE screen.
translation: 我們需要一名船員。從 TRADE（交易）畫面雇用五名工作人員。

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to hire in multiples of 5.
translation: 注意：您可以 SHIFT CLICK 以 5 的倍數租用。

english: Those crew will also need SPACESUITS as there is no atmosphere onboard our ship yet.\n\nOrder five SPACESUITS for the new crew.
translation: 這些船員也需要空間服裝，因為我們的船上還沒有大氣。\n\n為新船員訂購五個空間服裝。

english:
We also need resources for the ship to function.

Use the TRADE screen to buy:
- 5x FUEL
- 5x OXYGEN
- 5x FTL CHARGE
- 2x FOOD
- 2x WATER.

CONFIRM the trade when you are done.
translation:
使用 TRADE 畫面購買：
- 5x FUEL
- 5x OXYGEN
- 5x FTL CHARGE
- 2x FOOD
- 2x WATER。

完成後確認交易。

english: We can directly control our engine THROTTLE from here.\n\nTry increasing your engine throttle with this control.
translation: 我們可以從這裡直接控制引擎的節流閥。\n\n嘗試用這個控制項增加引擎的節流閥。

english: We can also turn the ship by left clicking in TACTICAL mode, in the direction we wish to travel.
translation: 我們也可以在 TACTICAL（戰術）模式下按左鍵，朝我們想要的方向轉動飛船。

english: We can send our ship to a specific location by RIGHT-CLICKING. Try setting a destination by right clicking in the tactical view.
translation: 我們可以透過右鍵單擊將船艦送往特定地點。嘗試在戰略檢視中按一下滑鼠右鍵來設定目的地。

english: Your crew will continue to operate the ship and keep the engines running as you travel around. Try flying around the system until you have a handle on the controls.\n\nWhen you are ready, bring the ship to a stop by setting the THROTTLE to zero in TACTICAL mode.
translation: 當您四處旅行時，您的船員會繼續操作飛船並維持引擎運轉。請嘗試在系統中四處飛行，直到您掌握控制為止。\n\n當您準備好時，在戰術模式下將 THROTTLE 設定為零，讓飛船停下來。

english: Now that our ship is up and running, we need to earn our way.  We can complete contracts for financial reward and reputation.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS screen to see a list of available contracts.
translation: 現在我們的船隻已經開始運作，我們需要賺取我們的路徑。  我們可以完成契約以獲得經濟報酬和聲望。\n\n開啟契約畫面，查看可用契約清單。

english: Contracts are assigned to the ship you currently have selected.\n\nOnly the PROCYON can travel between locations, so select the PROCYON.
translation: \n\n只有 PROCYON 可以在不同地點之間旅行，因此請選擇 PROCYON。

english: Here we have a TRANSPORT PASSENGER contract, click it to see more details.
translation: 這裡有一份 TRANSPORT PASSENGER 合約，請按一下以查看更多詳細資訊。

english: This mission requires us to transport a group of people from here to another location in the sector.\n\nClick the accept button to assign this contract to the PROCYON.
translation: \n\n按下接受按鈕，將此任務指派給 PROCYON。

english: The passengers will be delivered to the PROCYON by shuttle.
translation: 乘客將由穿梭巴士送至 PROCYON。

english: All passengers have been delivered to the PROCYON, and our FTL drive is operational. We must now plot an FTL jump to their destination.\n\nOpen the SECTOR MAP.
translation: 所有乘客都已送抵 PROCYON，我們的超光速驅動器也已啟動。\n\n開啟星域地圖。

english:
This is a map of all the systems in this sector.

Our ship and our space station are located in the middle, where the map is marked YOU-ARE-HERE.

Set a course to the destination (labelled TRANSPORT PASSENGERS) by clicking on it.
translation:
我們的太空船和太空站位於中間，也就是地圖上標示為 YOU-ARE-HERE 的地方。

點選目的地（標示為 TRANSPORT PASSENGERS）設定航向。

english: Close the SECTOR MAP by clicking the X in the top right corner, or by pressing ESC.
translation: 按一下右上角的 X 或按 ESC 關閉 SECTOR MAP。

english: Open the FTL screen to order the FTL jump.
translation: 開啟 FTL 畫面，命令進行 FTL 跳躍。

english: Click on PREPARE JUMP to align the ship and prepare for hyperspace.
translation: 按一下準備跳躍，對齊飛船並準備進入超空間。

english: The PROCYON will align for hyperspace, and prepare the FTL drive to make the jump.
translation: PROCYON 號會對準超空間，準備超光速驅動器進行跳躍。

english: Click the JUMP button to jump to hyperspace.
translation: 按一下 JUMP 按鈕跳到超空間。

english: We now need to turn in our completed passenger contract.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS screen and select the passenger mission.
translation: \n\n開啟 CONTRACTS 畫面，選擇乘客任務。

english: Click the DELIVER button to drop off the passengers and receive payment
translation: 按一下 DELIVER 按鈕，送走乘客並收取付款

english: The career you choose is now up to you.  There are many opportunities to choose from, and you'll learn more as you work.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS board.
translation: 您選擇的職業現在由您決定。  有許多機會可以選擇，您會在工作中學到更多。\n\n開啟 CONTRACTS 板。

english: We are now going to learn how to produce STARGATE RESIN.
translation: 我們現在要學習如何生產 STARGATE RESIN。

english: Turning our attention back to the Stargate, the Stargate project also requires us to produce STARGATE RESIN.\n\nWe are going to use the INDUSTRIOUS to collect METREON GAS, refine it, and process it into STARGATE RESIN.
translation: 將注意力轉回星門，星門計畫也需要我們生產星門晶粒（STARGATE RESIN）。\n\n，我們要利用 INDUSTRIOUS 收集 METREON GAS，提煉後加工成星門晶粒（STARGATE RESIN）。

english:
Raise enough money to purchase for INDUSTRIOUS:

- 1x GAS COLLECTOR
- 1x REFINERY
- 1x CHEMICAL LAB
translation:
為 INDUSTRIOUS 籌集足夠的資金來購買：

- 1x GAS COLLECTOR
- 1x REFINERY
- 1x CHEMICAL LAB

english: Before we can start collecting the METREON GAS, we need to move the INDUSTRIOUS to a system containing a GAS CLOUD.\n\nUse the SECTOR MAP to select a suitable destination.
translation: 在開始收集 METREON GAS 之前，我們需要先將 INDUSTRIOUS 移到含有 GAS CLOUD 的系統。\n\n使用 SECTOR MAP（區域地圖）選擇合適的目的地。

english: Close the sector map and use the FTL Window to jump the INDUSTRIOUS to the nebula.
translation: 關閉區域地圖，使用超光速視窗跳轉 INDUSTRIOUS 到星雲。

english: Install the GAS COLLECTOR, REFINERY and CHEMICAL LAB so that they are close to each other.
translation: 安裝 GAS COLLECTOR、REFINERY 和 CHEMICAL LAB，使它們彼此靠近。

english: Power up the GAS COLLECTOR, REFINERY and CHEMICAL LAB.
translation: 啟動 GAS COLLECTOR、REFINERY 和 CHEMICAL LAB。

english: Right click on the REFINERY and set its recipe to REFINE METREON GAS.
translation: 在 REFINERY 上按一下滑鼠右鍵，然後將其配方設定為 REFINE METREON GAS。

english: Right click on the CHEMICAL LAB and set its recipe to MAKE STARGATE RESIN.
translation: 在 CHEMICAL LAB 上按一下滑鼠右鍵，將其配方設定為製造 STARGATE RESIN。

english: Connect the GAS COLLECTOR to the REFINERY with a PIPE.
translation: 用管道將集氣器與精煉廠連接。

english: Connect the REFINERY to the CHEMICAL LAB with a PIPE.
translation: 用管道連接 REFINERY 和 CHEMICAL LAB。

english: Well done, you have started to produce STARGATE RESIN.\n\nWhen you have produced enough, travel back to any COLONY, SHIP YARD or the STARGATE system to sell it to the STARGATE PROJECT.
translation: \n\n當您生產足夠的星門晶粒時，請回到任何殖民地、船場或星門系統，將晶粒賣給星門計劃。

english: In order to be able to dock successfully, your ship needs at least four working THRUSTERS.\n\nUse a different ship, or purchase and install four thrusters at a nearby trading post.
translation: 為了能夠成功停靠，您的船至少需要四個正常運作的推進器。\n\n使用不同的船，或在附近的貿易站購買並安裝四個推進器。

english: Zoom in so that you can see the docking guides more clearly. They are RED diamonds extending from the docking ports.
translation: 放大，以便更清楚地看到停靠導板。它們是從停靠埠延伸出來的紅色菱形。
打開 MANEUVERING THRUSTER 控制鈕。

english:
Use your THRUSTERS to maneuver your ship so that RED diamonds of your docking ports align with the docking port of the *X.

When aligned correctly, they will both turn YELLOW.

Keep the ships aligned until the docking bridge is fully extended.
translation:
使用您的舵手來操控您的船艦，使您的船塢連接埠的紅鑽與*X 的連接埠對齊。

對齊正確之後，它們都會變成黃色。

保持船艦對齊，直到連接橋完全伸展為止。

english: Select the UMC Astral Temptress. \n\n As you can see it has no crew.
translation: 選擇 UMC Astral Temptress。 \n\n 您可以看到它沒有船員。

english: Select the SOURCE ship that the crew will come FROM.
translation: 選擇船員來自的 SOURCE 船。

english: Click in the CREW cell of the DESTINATION ship to request 5 crew to transfer.
translation: 點選目的地船艦的 CREW 單元格，要求轉移 5 名船員。

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to request transfer in multiples of 5.
translation: 注意：您可以 SHIFT CLICK 來要求以 5 的倍數進行傳輸。

english:
Your guns can also target specific points on enemy ships.

First, select which guns you would like to use.

You can SHIFT CLICK to select multiple guns.
translation:
您的砲也可以針對敵人船隻上的特定點。

首先，選擇您想使用的砲。

您可以 SHIFT CLICK 來選擇多種砲。

english: The effect of the EMP is wearing off!\n\nDeploy your weapons and make your crew ready to fight by clicking on BATTLE STATIONS.
translation: EMP 的效果正在消失！\n\n部署您的武器，並按一下 BATTLE STATIONS（戰鬥站），讓您的船員準備好戰鬥。

english: Make sure to keep moving during combat, this increases your EVASION and makes you a harder target to hit.
translation: 確保在戰鬥中保持移動，這會增加您的 EVASION，使您成為更難擊中的目標。

english: You will need a Mining Laser. These use a lot of power so consider installing extra reactors or batteries.\n\nInstall a MINING LASER and connect it to the power grid.
translation: 您需要一個 Mining Laser。這些設備會消耗大量電力，因此請考慮安裝額外的反應器或電池。\n\n安裝一個 Mining LASER 並將其連接到電網。

english: Make sure to UNDOCK from any other ship (from the TACTICAL screen).
translation: 請務必從任何其他船隻 (從 TACTICAL 畫面) 解鎖。

english: Look at the rocks on the map, these indicate ASTEROID BELTS. \n\nFly to a system in an asteroid belt, it will probably contain Tilium Ore.
translation: 看看地圖上的岩石，這些表示小行星帶。\n\n飛往小行星帶中的系統，那裡可能有 Tilium 礦石。

english:
You can also target specific mineral patches.

First, select which laser you would like to use.

You can SHIFT CLICK to select multiple lasers.
translation:
您也可以針對特定的礦物斑塊。

首先，選擇您想使用的雷射。

您可以 SHIFT CLICK 來選擇多個雷射。

english: Drones will collect mined resources.\n\nInstall a DRONE BAY so your drones can collect the Tilium Ore.
translation: \n\n安裝 DRONE BAY，讓您的無人機可以收集 Tilium Ore。

english: You also need to make sure that GATHER MATERIALS is enabled in FLEET ORDERS.
translation: 您也需要確定在 FLEET ORDERS 中已啟用 GATHER MATERIALS。

english: You will need to smelt the raw Tilium Ore to crystals.\n\nInstall a SMELTER.
Right click on the SMELTER and select TILIUM ORE to smelt it into Tilium Crystals.
translation: 在 SMELTER 上按一下滑鼠右鍵，然後選擇 TILIUM ORE，即可將它冶煉成 Tilium Crystals。

english: Click on the JMC MINING STATION, an old unused industrial station for sale.
translation: 點選 JMC MINING STATION，這是一個待售的未使用舊工業站。

english: Click on the BUY button to purchase the JMC MINING STATION.
translation: 按一下購買按鈕，即可購買 JMC MINING STATION。

english: Well done, you have purchased the JMC MINING STATION.
translation: 做得好！您已購買 JMC MINING STATION。
